thread.title: Expecting Mom Has Hilarious Reaction to Gender Reveal – Mom of 2 Boys Finds Out She's Having a Girl
thread.title_full: Expecting Mom Has Hilarious Reaction to Gender Reveal – Mom of 2 Boys Finds Out She's Having a Girl

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Expecting Mom Has Hilarious Reaction to Gender Reveal – Mom of 2 Boys Finds Out She's Having a Girl
text:
I've seen some elaborate and hilarious baby gender reveals (and gender reveal epic fails ) in my day, but this one just might take the cake. In a newly viral gender reveal video reported by PopSugar , an expecting mom almost literally loses her shit when she finds out she's having a baby girl.
Baby gender preference is definitely a (totally fine and normal) thing among pregnant women and dads-to-be alike. But Egreis Gjergjani's hilariously dramatic behavior after being handed a gender reveal cake slice with pink frosting takes that to a whoooole new level. Her excitement is understandable though – the soon-to-be mom of three already has two little boys, Gio and Charlie, with her husband Jeremy. Having a daughter is a completely different and new experience, and based on a few of her subsequent Instagram posts , it's clear that she's looking forward to it.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below And I'll end up as a meme somewhere. Fml! We're having a GIRL
A video posted by Egreis Gjergjani (@thestilettomeup) on Feb 5, 2017 at 9:37am PST
Before Gjergjani, a fashion blogger and the founder of children's luxury brand Itty Bitty Toes , can even look at the cake slice, the entire room erupts in cheers. Her friends and family's excited reactions have nothing on hers though — she drops the cake slice as if it's on fire, covering her mouth and shrieking before falling to her knees. The ecstatic mom's hands literally shake and she nearly drops her very confused toddler son amid the fracas.
Clearly, the self-proclaimed Albanian "shoe queen" (who currently has 457,000 followers on Instagram) realized that her goofy meltdown would be a hit online. "And I'll end up as a meme somewhere," she captioned the video post. "Fml! We're having a GIRL "
From: Redbook
